alert.note: Alert for Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:55PM EDT until May 03 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PIKE AND CENTRAL ROSS COUNTIES... At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Folk Village, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Bainbridge, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, Summithill, Bourneville, Knockemstiff, Andersonville, Massieville, Scioto Trail State Park and Buchanan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
